actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 94-89.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: Resolution to provide for the expenses of the investigations and studies to be conducted by the Permanent Select Committee on Aging.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 94-89) Authorizes an appropriation of $600,000 for investigations and studies of the Permanent House Select Committee on Aging, of which no more than $50,000 may be used for services of individual consultants or organizations pursuant to the Legislative Reorganization Act. Prohibits the use of such appropriations for study or investigation of any subject which is being investigated for the same purpose by any other House committee.

titles.title: Resolution to provide for the expenses of the investigations and studies to be conducted by the Permanent Select Committee on Aging.
